# Gimbalabs PBL ðŸ“¢Governance Sessions go Live!

![Gimbalabs PBL ðŸ“¢Governance Sessions go Live!](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fucarecdn.com%2Fa9c9231e-71cc-43e4-b882-6f5063be0dad%2F&w=3840&q=75)

Hey everyone! In Jan + Feb 2024, Gimbalabs Plutus PBL â›ºLive Coding will be replaced temporarily by Gimbalabs PBL ðŸ“¢Governance Sessions. We'll use Patterns from #Sociocracy 3.0 to help distribute ownership to anyone who wants explore the role that education plays in supporting a decentralized ecosystem.

[![r/cardano - Gimbalabs PBL ðŸ“¢Governance Sessions go Live!](https://preview.redd.it/667n0ki7pibc1.png?width=1587&format=png&auto=webp&s=a1c8a274af4d41a43d07126eaf1d50dfd0e1570f)](https://preview.redd.it/667n0ki7pibc1.png?width=1587&format=png&auto=webp&s=a1c8a274af4d41a43d07126eaf1d50dfd0e1570f)

![r/cardano - Gimbalabs PBL ðŸ“¢Governance Sessions go Live!](https://preview.redd.it/667n0ki7pibc1.png?width=1587&format=png&auto=webp&s=a1c8a274af4d41a43d07126eaf1d50dfd0e1570f)

Starting tomorrow, we'll run a series of six Driver Mapping Workshops (<https://patterns.sociocracy30.org/driver-mapping.html>).

If you've been around Gimbalabs for any amount of time, I hope you'll participate! Together, we'll set the direction for Gimbalabs in 2024 and beyond.

Zoom link: <https://gimbalabs.com/governance>

[![r/cardano - Gimbalabs PBL ðŸ“¢Governance Sessions go Live!](https://preview.redd.it/mnw41udjpibc1.png?width=1366&format=png&auto=webp&s=cdc46bb70e7349430805bf84558f5190ac8ad2a4)](https://preview.redd.it/mnw41udjpibc1.png?width=1366&format=png&auto=webp&s=cdc46bb70e7349430805bf84558f5190ac8ad2a4)

![r/cardano - Gimbalabs PBL ðŸ“¢Governance Sessions go Live!](https://preview.redd.it/mnw41udjpibc1.png?width=1366&format=png&auto=webp&s=cdc46bb70e7349430805bf84558f5190ac8ad2a4)

All best + see you soon!  
Sebastian from the Gimbalabs team
